content.raw:
looks good to me! I think the bigger icons are nice.

What do you think about centering the axes?
content.html:
looks good to me! I think the bigger icons are nice.

What do you think about centering the axes?

pull_request.title: Model Editor: Show / hide link frames

pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Show / hide link frames

content.raw:
What do you think? I also made the icons a bit bigger. I started with the same RGB used for the config widget, but changed the blue to be slightly more visible... It's still hard to see though. I also thought of adding a border to the arrows, but I think it can start getting too messy

![fra.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2125381745-fra.png)
content.html: What do you think? I also made the icons a bit bigger. I started with the same RGB used for the config widget, but changed the blue to be slightly more visible... It's still hard to see though. I also thought of adding a border to the arrows, but I think it can start getting too messy

pull_request.title: Model Editor: Show / hide link frames

pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Show / hide link frames

content.raw:
Yeah I don't like FRA either. I think FRAME would be too small.

I like the idea of the 3 axes, it would be nice if the eye is there as well. I'll see if I can put that together.

Makes sense, I'll change the order.
content.html:
Yeah I don't like FRA either. I think FRAME would be too small.

I like the idea of the 3 axes, it would be nice if the eye is there as well. I'll see if I can put that together.

Makes sense, I'll change the order.

pull_request.title: Model Editor: Show / hide link frames

pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Show / hide link frames

content.raw:
looks good to me. I'm just not sure if users will be able to know what "FRA" means in the icon label the first time they look at it. They will find out eventually. Will "FRAME" be too small and unreadable? Or maybe just an icon with 3 axes?

How about ordering the icons so that they are consistent with the tabs. ie. FRA icon | VIS icon | COL icon
content.html:
looks good to me. I'm just not sure if users will be able to know what "FRA" means in the icon label the first time they look at it. They will find out eventually. Will "FRAME" be too small and unreadable? Or maybe just an icon with 3 axes?

How about ordering the icons so that they are consistent with the tabs. ie. FRA icon | VIS icon | COL icon
